txt.en: 'My friend, I move south across the Bridge of Sílabal tomorrow. Tonight, if you will, join me so we may speak one last time before I make this new journey.\n\n'I grow weary of my choice to chase my parent's wishes. Then, there is the hope that I may see Ashâmi again.'
After a good conversation and a full night, Raphûz moved on to Khûd Zagin. You should seek him at Jirush.
Raphûz informed you he is moving south across the Bridge of Sílabal to a new post. Before his departure he wants to talk over a smoke.
'It is good to see you well, my friend. I pray your journeys have not changed who you are. For you are the best of us.'
'Join me in the evening by the fire. We will share another smoke and discussion.'
Raphûz asked you to join him for a smoke and conversation in the Wrackwade camp.
